  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player (String username, Color myColor, int myCoins, Wizard wizard, int towers, Entrance entrance)
      Is the player's representation
      Parameters:
      username - is the player's name
      myColor - is the player's color
      myCoins - is the player's number of coins
      wizard - is the player's wizard
      towers - is the number of towers on the player's game board
      entrance - is the player's entrance
